alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Buchanan; Gentry; Holt; Nodaway; Worth (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 1:29AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Doniphan, Atchison, northwestern Buchanan, southwestern Worth, northwestern Gentry, eastern Holt, southern Nodaway and Andrew Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 129 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Fillmore, or 14 miles north of Savannah, moving east southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Maryville, Atchison, Savannah, Wathena, Stanberry, Mound City, Highland, Troy, Country Club, Oregon, Effingham, Ravenwood, Maitland, Amazonia, Lancaster, Forest City, Fillmore, White Cloud and Muscotah. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 54 and 83. Interstate 229 between mile markers 9 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Andrew; Buchanan; Gentry; Holt; Nodaway; Worth
